Articles.Content: I just want to ask, if someone made an RP thread that had a clear set of rules, was moderated by the thread poster, and was approved by the admins, would it still be banned?
It would still be banned. No roleplay...period.

There seems to be nothing officially banning roleplay in the Forum rules, though I know for a fact that threads are locked/deleted if they become roleplaying. Now, if you had the good word of the admins, it would be a possibility, I suppose, but I doubt that will happen.

EDIT: Nevermind, there is a bit in there about roleplay. Still, the permission aspect stands.

You can link to roleplay as long as you don't do it here, it just causes problems.

Thread locked, by the way.

There seems to be nothing officially banning roleplay in the Forum rules...

Actually, there is.

Forum rule 2.2.j : Staging for scenarios of roleplay.

Because it causes nasty fights that spill over into other areas of the forum.
